name: eigenfocus
description: Eigenfocus is a personal productivity and task-management system that structures work into projects and focuses. It provides a web interface for planning, tracking, and reflecting on tasks while keeping data under your control.
features: Project Structure: Organize work into focused projects. Clear task hierarchy.
Task Tracking: Monitor progress and completion status. Stay on top of work.
Reflection Tools: Review and analyze your productivity. Continuous improvement.
Web Interface: Access your tasks from any browser. Work anywhere, anytime.
Personal Productivity: Designed for individual workflow optimization. Boost your efficiency.
Self-Hosted: Keep your productivity data private. Your tasks, your control.
